r.s: Developer tools for the Pyrus installer
r.d:
This package contains several custom commands for Pyrus.
Included are commands for: * Creating pear2 and pecl package skeletons $ php pyrus.phar generate-pear2 MyNewPackage * Creating a package.xml file $ php pyrus.phar make * Packaging PEAR2 and PEAR releases $ php pyrus.phar package * Running phpt tests and generating code coverage reports $ php pyrus.phar run-phpt -m
r.n:
Feature release:
* Change namespace from pear2 to PEAR2. * Add coverage web page example to the www directory.
